name: Puppy Cube Blast: Tap, Pop&Win
description:
WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE! It's Puppy Cube blast time now! From the creators of Puppy Cube comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Play by clicking to smash 2 or more adjacent cubes of the same color. Bombs that generate magic by clicking to smash 5 or more cubes will help you pass the level easily. Use subtle clicks and powerful bombs to collect stars through levels to win rewards.

No need to design home or garden like homescapes or gardenscapes. Crush and blast the block and brick like in the candy crush saga and collect toy and toon prize!

FEATURES
- Cute character to keep you company on your adventure
- Addictive gaming experience that can share with friends all over the world
- +3500 puzzles, easy and fun to play but challenging to master
- A puzzle game that will relax your brain
- Simple operation & excitement challenges
- Brand new play game with amazing screen, quality graphic and vision effects

Let's relax and join yourself in the wonderful jouney of Puppy Cube, blast the cubes at all!
